item.title: Guys Who Made Money Selling Mobile Ads Want to Make Money With Ads in Virtual Reality
item.description:
Guys Who Made Money Selling Mobile Ads Want to Make Money With Ads in Virtual Reality

Virtual reality is in its "early days" - ask anyone involved in the field, and that's usually their chosen term. And like the genesis of social media, there's a coming mad dash of people eager for ways to cash in. On Facebook, gaming companies figured out they could spend fistfuls advertising mobile games and get paying users in return.

item.title: UX & Virtual Reality - Designing for interfaces without Screens
item.description:
UX & Virtual Reality - Designing for interfaces without Screens

It's an experience that's been around since the midÂ­ 80s, but technology always seemed to hold it back. The advances in smartphones and related technologies have finally brought the incredible potential of VR within reach. Now, we're in the midst of a virtual reality revolution.
